recipesJson.name: Priests in Playgrounds (Live Mixing 02/09)
recipesJson.author: SkiddlzNinja
recipesJson.description: A strawberry shortcake done so well, you'll be happier than a priest in a playground. No steep needed, so go nuts.

reviews.text: As Skiddlz said before he made this, some spices go well with certain fruits. Here it is cinnamon and strawberry, I don't think I would try priests in playgrounds tho, … very good mix here, … Reminds me of a joke; Whats worse than …….

Alright I will say it Wow I am glad I mixed up 240ml. I mean just look at the ingredients!! How could it be bad????  I did have to substitute fa juicy strawberry in place of TPA strawberry but other than that its exactly as intended.. Let's just say its a really great tasting vape!!!!
